lead_paragraph: Two years after they suffered a humiliating 7-1 defeat by Germany in the World Cup semi-final, Brazil return to the same Belo Horizonte stadium charged with overcoming that bitter memory – and their toughest rivals Argentina.

headline.print_headline: Two Years on From 7-1, Brazil Face Arch-Rivals Argentina
headline.main: Two Years on From 7-1, Brazil Face Arch-Rivals Argentina
